title: Senior PHP Developer
text:
Seeking experienced a Senior PHP Developer for a Well-Established international IT Company!

Requirements:

Degree in Computer Science or Information Technology

8+ years in an IT environment

Skills and Responsibilities:

· 8 years’ experience building Software

· Experience in developing in Agile Teams

Technologies and Skills:

Angular, TypeScript, NodeJS, Golang, PHP, MySQL, Elasticsearch, Redis, RabbitMQ, Docker, Nginx, Jenkins

Email your CV to it.careers@goldmantech.co.za. You can also contact any of the consultants on XXX-XXXX or alternatively visit our website at http://www.goldmantech.co.za

Correspondence will only be conducted with short listed candidates.

Should you not hear from us within 3 days, please consider your application unsuccessful.
description: Senior PHP Developer, Cape Town, R41 667.00 - R50 000.00 Per Month (Negotiable) - Seeking experienced a Senior PHP Developer for a Well-Established international IT Company!
